field.name: summary
field.value: Logging Facility points to invalid class

field.name: description
field.value:
As reported on the forum
"This is the correct factory but the reference in the Logging Facility is incorrect. The actual code is:
private static readonly String WebLoggerFactoryTypeName = "Castle.Services.Logging.Web.WebLoggerFactory, Castle.Services.Logging.Web";
and according to your reply it should be:
private static readonly String WebLoggerFactoryTypeName = "Castle.Services.Logging.WebLoggerFactory, Castle.Services.Logging";"
